data.eml:eml: A new species of Pristimantis (Amphibia, Anura, Craugastoridae) from the foothills of the Andes in Manu National Park, southeastern Peru

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shepack, Alexander, von May, Rudolf, Ttito, Alex, Catenazzi, Alessandro (2016): A new species of Pristimantis (Amphibia, Anura, Craugastoridae) from the foothills of the Andes in Manu National Park, southeastern Peru. ZooKeys 594: 143-164, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.594.8295, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.594.8295
